game.name: DCS: Fw 190 D-9 Dora
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, Downloadable Content, Captions available, VR Support, Partial Controller Support, Includes level editor
game.shortDescription: The Focke-Wulf Fw 190 is widely regarded as Germany's best fighter aircraft of World War II. Its appearance in the skies over France in August 1941 was a rude shock to the Allies, as it was clearly superior to any other plane.
game.shortDescriptionEn: The Focke-Wulf Fw 190 is widely regarded as Germany's best fighter aircraft of World War II. Its appearance in the skies over France in August 1941 was a rude shock to the Allies, as it was clearly superior to any other plane.
